caption.p: The 5G telemedicine network of Sichuan Province, China, established during the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic. This system makes use of the newly established China Telecom 5G Dual Gigabit infrastructure and currently covers all designated hospitals for COVID-19 of Sichuan Province (5 provincial-level, 24 municipal-level, and 179 county-level hospitals), with the West China Hospital of Sichuan University (WCHSU) as the central node. The median distance between a spoke hospital and WCHSU is 319 km (range 20 to 1191 km).
